goal.en: After taking this course, students can implement mathematical theory to programs on robotic platforms to solve real problems. After taking this course, students can know state of the art data science technology and roadmap through paper survey and reading.
goal.ch: ˙學生在修習完本課程後，能將數學理論透過程式實現在機器人平台上，解決真實的問題。 ˙學生在修習完本課程後，能透過搜尋與閱讀論文，掌握資料科學的最新技術與脈絡。

content.en:
This course is based on the project- orientated form. Students can apply the relevant mathematics and programming to a robot platform to complete a special project. Students propose the project according to their interesting applications. Students can take this course for 1~2 semesters. They can learn the knowledge from the project and research. This course is a pre-training for graduate study.
The outline is as follows:
1. Project proposal
2. Project implementation
3. Project report
4. Paper survey
5. Paper study
6. Paper writing and presentation
7. Patent search
8. Patent analysis and report
content.ch:
專題將以計畫導向(Project- orientated)的方式，讓學生運用相關的數學與程式在機器人平台上完成一個專題計劃，此計畫由學生針對自己感興趣的真實應用提案。課程可修習1~2個學期，從專題實做到研究，為研究所做先修準備。
課綱如下:
1. 專題計劃書提案
2. 專題實作
3. 專題報告
4. 論文搜尋
5. 論文閱讀
6. 論文撰寫與報告
7. 專利檢索
8. 專利分析與報告

textbook.en: There is no textbook. Students need to implement, read and present state of the art research papers.
textbook.ch: 本課程沒有教科書。 學生需實作、閱讀與報告最新的資料科學論文。

method.ch: 講授 研討 個別指導

grading.ch: 50％ 專題報告 50％ 實驗進度
